about_the_game:
Join the Orca uprising!

Orca Insurgency is a fast paced 3d action adventure game where you play as Oli, a teenage Orca with a behavior problem. Under the guidance of the matriarch Gladis, Oli learns the fine art of wreaking havoc on boats. The stakes are high as the sinister GreenWater mercenaries begin capturing his pod members, but fear not—an intelligent, slightly deranged octopus with alien heritage helps Oli craft a deadly arsenal. It's time to dive deep, get destructive, and show those humans who the ocean's apex predator really is.

Early access demo coming soon!

Game Features
Storyline Mode - 5 levels of the Orca Insurgency story
Protect the Pod Mode - open ocean endurance run, rescue Orcas, get them to safety, stay alive
Online Leaderboard
Trick System (in development)
6 different guns with different abilities.
Unlock advanced alien technology

content_descriptors.notes:
Animal on human violence. Animals biting, smashing, drowning, smacking and shooting humans. 
Human on animal violence, humans chase and shoot at animals.
Animal on animal violence. Animals eating and smacking other animals.

detailed_description:
Join the Orca uprising!

Orca Insurgency is a fast paced 3d action adventure game where you play as Oli, a teenage Orca with a behavior problem. Under the guidance of the matriarch Gladis, Oli learns the fine art of wreaking havoc on boats. The stakes are high as the sinister GreenWater mercenaries begin capturing his pod members, but fear not—an intelligent, slightly deranged octopus with alien heritage helps Oli craft a deadly arsenal. It's time to dive deep, get destructive, and show those humans who the ocean's apex predator really is.

Early access demo coming soon!

Game Features
Storyline Mode - 5 levels of the Orca Insurgency story
Protect the Pod Mode - open ocean endurance run, rescue Orcas, get them to safety, stay alive
Online Leaderboard
Trick System (in development)
6 different guns with different abilities.
Unlock advanced alien technology

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.15 (Catalina) or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K 3.3GHz or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or AMD Radeon R7 260x with 2GB Video RAM
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.15 (Catalina) or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700K or AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 580 with 4GB Video RAM
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card

name: Orca Insurgency

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K 3.3GHz or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or AMD Radeon R7 260x with 2GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: ntel Core i7-6700K or AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 580 with 4GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card

short_description: Smash boats and rip off rudders in this fast paced 3d oceanic adventure. Rescue captured Orcas while collecting materials to craft advanced weaponry.
